sqlMap.select:
SELECT c.PIN AS PIN , c.CPA_ID , mi.KOREAN_NM , (SELECT TRIM(cc.CD_NM) FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2020' AND cc.CD = c.MBER_FLAG) AS MBER_FLAG_NM , (SELECT ai.KOR_AUD_NM FROM AUDIT_INFO ai WHERE ai.AUDIT_CD = (SELECT ao.AUDIT_CD FROM AUDIT_OFFICE ao WHERE ao.AUDIT_ID = c.AUDIT_ID)) AS AUDIT_NM ,
CASE WHEN c.MBER_FLAG ='A2020010' OR c.MBER_FLAG ='A2020020' OR c.MBER_FLAG ='A2020030' THEN (SELECT ai.KOR_AUD_NM FROM AUDIT_INFO ai WHERE ai.AUDIT_CD = (SELECT ao.AUDIT_CD FROM AUDIT_OFFICE ao WHERE ao.AUDIT_ID = c.AUDIT_ID)) WHEN c.MBER_FLAG ='A2020040' OR c.MBER_FLAG ='A2020050' THEN '휴 업' ELSE '' END AS status
FROM CPA c LEFT JOIN MBER_INDVDLINFO mi ON c.PIN = mi.PIN WHERE c.pin = #uniqId#
